title: 香港語教科書整緊啦，急要外語人幫手

replies.msg:
為左保護香港話，我地應該整一個香港廣東話考試，需要外語人！
https://t.me/joinchat/NteqeBSRDoPhmP6cBUht0A
因為香港政府逐步啊消滅緊我哋呢個語言
有冇一班學緊外語嘅人我哋一齊整一本
香港語教科書
教外國人
學廣東話同埋簡單嘅英文
我哋要開一間正式嘅廣東話學校
先可以保護我哋香港呢個文化！

replies.msg:
諗太遠-_-

quote.msg: 噉又唔可以噉講喎，香港粵語喺學術上嚟講點都係粵語一部份喎

歐洲好多語言學術上都係同一類
不過因為政治而劃分為唔同語言
噉你覺得廣東省嘅粵語同香港語有咩分別先，係，香港語有好多香港本土句子同英文，但主體仍然係粵語，頂多係叫香港粵語或香港話，但唔需要完全否定同支那粵語嘅關係

replies.msg: 荷蘭話同德文都通，但分開左，白俄同俄都通

quote.msg: 荷蘭話同德文都通，但分開左，白俄同俄都通

replies.msg:
I think your meaning of HK canton means, canton with HK slangs or... HK pronunciation? But I think we better differentiate well between hong kong slangs and canton. and do it step by step.
sorry to say it's meaningless to make a difference between HK canton and ML canton before strengthen our canton standard in majority.
It's not like the UK English and US English. Coz the ML wanted to eliminate cantonese, they would not be appreciate to speak canton.
They all understand HK canton is much better than ML canton.
They are learning from us and considering us as standard canton.
e.g. we never say 落水 and 燒煙, and they would change their form of terms when speaking to us. Everyone admitted the HK canton is the best comparing to the other canton speaker, even in other canton community.
in conclusion, to learn better canton it the best way of protecting canton.
but it's also appreciate to do a baby step on such topic to promote cantonese.
點解唔順便整Duolingo?

quote.msg:
wait, what is the aim for this book?
just for reading canton or what?
I wonder why there is no guidance of pronunciation attached...
Learning hongkongese

I think your meaning of HK canton means, canton with HK slangs or... HK pronunciation? But I think we better differentiate well between hong kong slangs and canton. and do it step by step.
sorry to say it's meaningless to make a difference between HK canton and ML canton before strengthen our canton standard in majority.
It's not like the UK English and US English. Coz the ML wanted to eliminate cantonese, they would not be appreciate to speak canton.
They all understand HK canton is much better than ML canton.
They are learning from us and considering us as standard canton.
e.g. we never say 落水 and 燒煙, and they would change their form of terms when speaking to us. Everyone admitted the HK canton is the best comparing to the other canton speaker, even in other canton community.
in conclusion, to learn better canton it the best way of protecting canton.
but it's also appreciate to do a baby step on such topic to promote cantonese.

replies.msg: 用英文做例子唔啱，歐洲大把語言通，但改個另一個名

quote.msg:
我以前讀書果時係叫d老師做先生 好少好少叫老師

通常 X先生 miss x 或者 X sir

而家香港d學生 都叫老師？

replies.msg:
先生係一個尊稱，通常係對受尊重嘅人都會叫先生（包括老師）。
除咗男人之外受尊重嘅女人&女教師都叫先生。
其實叫先生係好過叫老師，"老師"只係職業，唔係表示緊敬意。

Learning hongkongese

I think your meaning of HK canton means, canton with HK slangs or... HK pronunciation? But I think we better differentiate well between hong kong slangs and canton. and do it step by step.
sorry to say it's meaningless to make a difference between HK canton and ML canton before strengthen our canton standard in majority.
It's not like the UK English and US English. Coz the ML wanted to eliminate cantonese, they would not be appreciate to speak canton.
They all understand HK canton is much better than ML canton.
They are learning from us and considering us as standard canton.
e.g. we never say 落水 and 燒煙, and they would change their form of terms when speaking to us. Everyone admitted the HK canton is the best comparing to the other canton speaker, even in other canton community.
in conclusion, to learn better canton it the best way of protecting canton.
but it's also appreciate to do a baby step on such topic to promote cantonese.
